ASAE Offers You
Continued Education
T
^-HE OLD SAYING, “You have to run fast to
stand still” is more significant now than ever.
Every successful executive must keep abreast of
today’s constant, vital changes. ASAE provides
many ways to do this:
REGIONAL CONFERENCES—held each
year within easy reach of your office, they offer
programs that send you back to your desk better
able to solve your management problems.
SPECIAL SEMINARS—planned and
manned by foremost authorities in the field of
association management, for intimate, concen¬
trated learning.
INSTITUTES FOR ORGANIZATION
MANAGEMENT—held each summer at three
universities. The sequential courses lead you
through fundamentals (3 years), to advanced
management (3 years) and on to a post-graduate
Academy (3 years). ASAE cooperates with the
Chamber of Commerce of the U.S. in planning
these courses.
ANNUAL MEETING OF ASAE—a con¬
vention highlighted by workshops, ideas and
fellowship, offering you a chance to meet hun¬
dreds of association executives, each willing
to share or exchange ideas and management
experiences.
